Description: In this exciting episode, we feature the national champion of 2024 who impressively placed in the top 3 at the EMEA competition and won the latte art round winner award. Join us as he shares his inspiring journey, revealing his secret techniques for creating stunning latte art designs, the importance of milk texture and temperature control, and how thousands of hours of practice led to mastery. Discover the dedication behind becoming a champion, the challenges faced along the way, and valuable insights for anyone passionate about elevating their coffee craft.
